net.caspervg.jgaf

Interface Arguments

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Arguments.Default

    public interface Arguments
    Provides arguments to use in the genetic algorithm execution

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Arguments.Default
      Default set of arguments, using all the defaults outlined in the Arguments interface

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default int breedingPoolSize()
      Size of the breeding pool.
      default int killingPoolSize()
      Size of the killing pool.
      default Number maximumMutationAmount()
      Maximum amount of mutation to apply to an organism.
      default int numIterations()
      Number of iterations to run the algorithm.
      default int populationSize()
      Size of the population to use.

    • Method Detail

      • populationSize

        default int populationSize()
        Size of the population to use. By default, this is 1000
        Returns:
        Size of the population

      • numIterations

        default int numIterations()
        Number of iterations to run the algorithm. By default, this is 1000
        Returns:
        Number of iterations

      • maximumMutationAmount

        default Number maximumMutationAmount()
        Maximum amount of mutation to apply to an organism. By default, this is 0.1D
        Returns:
        Maximum amount of mutation

      • breedingPoolSize

        default int breedingPoolSize()
        Size of the breeding pool. By default, this is populationSize() / 10
        Returns:
        Size of the breeding pool

      • killingPoolSize

        default int killingPoolSize()
        Size of the killing pool. By default, this is breedingPoolSize()
        Returns:
        Size of the killing pool
